info.title: Manyfold API
info.description:
This document describes the REST API for this [Manyfold](https://manyfold.app) instance.

Warning! This API...

* ... is not complete! Functionality is limited for now, but future releases will add more capabilities.
* ... is not yet at v1! It's subject to breaking changes at any time.
* ... is only valid for this host! Other Manyfold instances running different software versions may expose a different set of API functionality.

href.description: The URL to the full NodeInfo document

get.summary: Get server metadata in NodeInfo 2.0 format

303.description: Redirect to oembed version of the provided URL

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specify which page of results to retrieve.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description:
Specify order of results; either by name, creation time, or updated time:
 * `name` 
 * `recent` 
 * `updated`

name.description: The human name of the collection

options.description: Manyfold uses the Tus protocol for resumable uploading; see https://tus.io/protocols/resumable-upload for full details.

schema.description: Comma separated versions of the Tus protocol supported by the server
Comma separated list of Tus protocol extensions supported by the server
The maximum file size that can be uploaded to the server

post.description: Manyfold uses the Tus protocol for resumable uploading; see https://tus.io/protocols/resumable-upload for full details.

parameters.name: Upload-Length
parameters.description: Total size of upload, in bytes

schema.description: URL for the newly created upload

403.description: Forbidden

401.description: Unauthorized

head.description: Manyfold uses the Tus protocol for resumable uploading; see https://tus.io/protocols/resumable-upload for full details.

schema.description: The expected total length of the file to be uploaded
The number of bytes of the file that have been uploaded so far

patch.description: Manyfold uses the Tus protocol for resumable uploading; see https://tus.io/protocols/resumable-upload for full details.

parameters.name: Upload-Offset
parameters.description: File offset for bytes being sent. Must be the same as current Upload-Offset value reported by the HEAD request.

parameters.name: Content-Length
parameters.description: The number of bytes being sent in the POST body

schema.description: The new upload offset after the uploaded bytes have been added

client_credentials.description: Authentication with the OAuth2 Client Credentials grant flow. You can generate client app credentials at /oauth/applications.

scopes.public: read public data accessible without logging in
scopes.read: read data accessible to the OAuth application's owner
scopes.write: create or change data that the OAuth application's owner has appropriate permissions for
scopes.delete: remove data that the OAuth application's owner has appropriate permissions for

caption.example: A short caption describing the file
A short caption describing the file

id.description: The ID of a completed upload, obtained from the upload endpoints

name.description: Used as model name if any files are uploaded that aren't compressed archives
